text: (napiye!) Um'mitam en atiyarkal ennaip parrik kettal (atarku nir kuruviraka:) ‘‘Niccayamaka nan unkalukku camipamanavan. (Evarum) ennai alaittal anta alaippalarin alaippukku vitaiyalippen.'' Atalal, avarkal ennitame pirarttanai ceyyavum; ennaiye nampikkai kollavum. (Atanal) avarkal nervali ataivarkal
